assets.name: K-nit Beanie Designer
assets.detail: A web app built with Ractive.js that provides consumers with a means of choosing their own colours for stock beanies at K-nit.co.uk.

assets.name: Typereel
assets.detail: A community for designers and typography enthusiasts to share speciments of type in the real world. UI built using Svelte and PostCSS. Currently in alpha.

assets.detail: A small website for a family-owned business in soccer training for youths in Sydney.
